Class ec.e.file.EOutputStream

Class ec.e.file.EOutputStream 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.io.OutputStream
           |
           +----ec.e.file.EOutputStream
public class EOutputStream
extends OutputStream
An output stream based on the E file classes rather than the Java file classes. The idea is to emulate the function of the java OutputStream class, but do so safely in the Vat environment. Thus we open from an E file object and hold onto the open stream with a leaf.

close()
Closes this stream and releases any system resources associated with it, by calling the stream's close method.
finalize()
Finalize by closing.
write(byte[])
Writes buf.length bytes from the specified byte array to this stream.
write(byte[], int, int)
Writes length bytes from the specified byte array starting at offset to this stream.
write(int)
Writes the specified byte to this stream.
